properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus my Savior to Bethlehem came
Born in a manger to sorrow and shame
Oh it was wonderful blest be His name
Seeking for me for me

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Seeking for me for me
(seeking for me)
Seeking for me for me
(seeking for me)
Oh it was wonderful blest be His name
Seeking for me for me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus my Savior on Calvary's tree
Paid the great debt and my soul He set free
Oh it was wonderful - how could it be
Dying for me for me

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Seeking for me for me
(seeking for me)
Seeking for me for me
(seeking for me)
Oh it was wonderful blest be His name
Seeking for me for me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus my Savior the same as of old
While I was wand'ring afar from the fold
Gently and long did He plead with my soul
Calling for me for me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jesus my Savior shall come from on high
Sweet is the promise as weary years fly
Oh I shall see Him descend from the sky
Coming for me for me
